Build-Depends: autopoint, autotools-dev, cdbs (>= 0.4.93~), debhelper (>= 9), dh-autoreconf, doxygen, libasound2-dev [linux-any], libavc1394-dev [linux-any], libavcodec-dev (>= 6:10~), libdv4-dev, libfaad-dev, libgl1-mesa-dev | libgl-dev, libgtk2.0-dev (>= 2.24), libjpeg-dev, libmp3lame-dev, libpng-dev, libpopt-dev, libraw1394-dev [linux-any], libsdl1.2-dev, libswscale-dev (>= 6:10~), libvorbis-dev, libx264-dev, libxaw7-dev, libxv-dev
